'Sodium nitrate' is the chemical compound with the formula NaNO 3.
This salt is also known as Chile saltpeter or Peru saltpeter (due to the large
deposits found in each country) to distinguish it from ordinary saltpeter,
potassium nitrate. The mineral form is also known as [[nitratine]], nitratite or
soda [[niter]].

Sodium nitrate is a white solid which is very soluble in water. It may be used
as a constituent of fertilizers, pyrotechnics and smoke bombs, glass and pottery
enamels, as a food preservative and a solid rocket propellant. It has been mined
extensively for these purposes.
